title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 252.10 - Answer; amendment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 252.10 - Answer; amendment

State Regulations

In the discretion of the director of PEPR or the hearing
officer, an answer may be amended upon motion of the party filing it, upon due
notice to all parties, at any time before the issuance of the final decision
and order. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
252.10

Renumbered from 251.29

New

York State Register February 15, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 07, eff. 2/15/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
